articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT nick.eth
ENS is looking for DevRel talent. Hit me up!
nader dabit (🧱, 🚀) | sha.eth | nader.sol: How to get hired in DevRel in web3
1. Find a protocol / team in need of DevRel
2. Learn tech then create a good example codebase with high quality learning material around it - workshop, tutorial, video
3. Apply for a grant, get paid for your work regardless
4. Share it
5. Apply
articles.title: RT nick.eth: ENS is looking for DevRel talent. Hit me up!

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Tableland
We love the mission of @developer_dao and want to give @tableland__ creators a chance to join. Friday at 10:00 AM PST, we'll be giving away a free @developer_dao membership at our bi-weekly @tableland__ workshop. Learn, build, and then join D_D to learn and build some more! 1/2

Guys Join D_D they, at least I have fun 😋

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT david phelps (🐮,🐮)(🃏,🃏)
did not hear, see, or think about a single animal jpeg for one week, but did hear, see, and think exclusively about future-bending projects like @CelestiaOrg @fuellabs_ @ankr @nomadxyz_ @guildxyz @PolymerDAO, and this is why devconnect is by far the best conference i've been to
